codelabs.title: Getting Started

codelabs.summary: Master the fundamentals of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build a fully functional task list application from scratch.

codelabs.title: Qiscus Adopt Stack - Learning Path
codelabs.summary: Comprehensive full-stack backend development journey. Master Go, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, CI/CD, Frontend, Testing, dan Capstone Project. Structured learning dengan 6 Phases dan 19 sub-phases.

codelabs.title: Mengatasi Imposter Syndrome Saat Melamar Pekerjaan
codelabs.summary: Panduan praktis untuk mobile developer yang merasa tidak PD saat melamar kerja. Pelajari strategi "Learn While Applying", gap analysis, dan mindset shift untuk meningkatkan confidence Anda.
